name: Gimel Dimension
description:
Defeat the Gimel invasion on this side shooter that explores the contrast lack between the projectiles and the background to create an unusual challenge that will confuse your head

- Each stage has its enemies and unique challenges;
- Unique bosses and mini-bosses on each stage;
- Real time upgrade system;
- Don't lose your cells between tries;
- Flash bombs to see projectiles in emergencies.
